page.title: 03Industry in Willingham
page.content: The main industry in Willingham is {market gardening.}There is a florist in the village and many people are involved with growing {flowers and fruit.}Some of the produce is sent to London and other large cities. The largest employers are Granta Windings, making{transformers,}and George Watts, a{haulage}firm. There is a wide variety of small businesses such as an undertakers, builders, an architect, computer consultants, a light engineering works involved in agricultural and garden machinery, as well as a printing firm and an estate agent. These enterprises employ mostly{local {people.}There is no heavy industry or separate industrial zone, the small firms being integrated within the residential areas.
